zh-cn: 台湾省立海事专科学校

description.zh-cn: 一所校本部位于台湾基隆市的国立综合大学，以海洋学相关研究闻名，隶属于台北联合大学系统、泛太平洋大学联盟等学术联盟。另于桃园市观音区与连江县北竿乡设有分校区。
description.en: A national comprehensive university headquartered in Keelung City, Taiwan, renowned for its research related to oceanography. It is a member of academic alliances such as the University System of Taipei and the Pan-Pacific University League. It also has branch campuses in Guanyin District, Taoyuan City, and Beigan Township, Lienchiang County.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学现任校长。
description.en: The current president of National Taiwan Ocean University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的教育行政主管机关。
description.en: The main educational authority of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由台湾北部数所研究型大学组成的大学系统。
description.en: A university system composed of several research-oriented universities in northern Taiwan.

nodes.id: 台湾永续治理大学联盟

zh-cn: 台湾永续治理大学联盟
en: Taiwan University Alliance for Sustainable Governance

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个大学联盟，旨在推动永续治理。
description.en: A university alliance in Taiwan aimed at promoting sustainable governance.

description.zh-cn: 一个由泛太平洋地区多所大学组成的学术联盟。
description.en: An academic alliance composed of several universities in the Pan-Pacific region.

description.zh-cn: 一个以海洋相关研究为核心的学术合作组织。
description.en: An academic cooperation organization focusing on ocean-related research.

nodes.id: 国际导向开放线上教育者联盟

zh-cn: 国际导向开放线上教育者联盟

description.zh-cn: 一个推动开放式线上教育的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization that promotes open online education.

description.zh-cn: 亚马逊公司提供的云计算服务平台。
description.en: A cloud computing services platform provided by Amazon.

nodes.id: 国立台湾海洋大学附属基隆海事高级中等学校

zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学附属基隆海事高级中等学校
附属基隆海事高级中等学校
国立基隆高级海事职业学校

description.zh-cn: 原为国立基隆高级海事职业学校，于2020年改隶为国立台湾海洋大学的附属学校。
description.en: Formerly the National Keelung Maritime Vocational High School, it became an affiliated school of National Taiwan Ocean University in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 台湾桃园市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前身“台湾省立海事专科学校”的首任校长。
description.en: The first president of the 'Taiwan Provincial Maritime Junior College', the predecessor of National Taiwan Ocean University.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长，历任台湾省立海事专科学校及台湾省立海洋学院时期。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University, serving during the periods of Taiwan Provincial Maritime Junior College and Taiwan Provincial College of Marine Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长，在其任内学校由学院升格为大学。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University, during whose tenure the institution was upgraded from a college to a university.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长，任内逝世。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University, who passed away in office.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学前校长，在其任内马祖校区正式启用。
description.en: Former president of National Taiwan Ocean University, during whose tenure the Matsu campus was officially inaugurated.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学为中华民国教育部管辖的国立大学。
description.en: National Taiwan Ocean University is a national university under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education of the Republic of China.

relationships.target: 台湾永续治理大学联盟
国际导向开放线上教育者联盟

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾海洋大学是亚马逊网路服务系统AWS Academy成员。
description.en: National Taiwan Ocean University is a member of the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Academy.

relationships.source: 国立台湾海洋大学附属基隆海事高级中等学校

description.zh-cn: 2020年8月，国立基隆高级海事职业学校改隶为国立台湾海洋大学的附属学校。
description.en: In August 2020, the National Keelung Maritime Vocational High School became an affiliated school of National Taiwan Ocean University.

relationships.target: 国立台湾海洋大学附属基隆海事高级中等学校

description.zh-cn: 教育部推动将国立基隆高级海事职业学校改隶为国立台湾海洋大学的附属学校。
description.en: The Ministry of Education promoted the affiliation of the National Keelung Maritime Vocational High School with National Taiwan Ocean University.

description.zh-cn: 桃园市政府与国立台湾海洋大学签署合作意向书，推动在观音区设立“观音校区”。
description.en: The Taoyuan City Government and National Taiwan Ocean University signed a letter of intent for cooperation to promote the establishment of the 'Guanyin Campus' in Guanyin District.
